# Resource summary Template

Things to include in this summary are

  - What the resource is (data model/template, ontology, dictionary/theserous, organization, server, or mix)?
  - Why that resource was created
  - How the resource relates to soil data specifically including how it can be used
      - server/host
      - describes measurements
      - describes soil processes and concepts
      - used to describe data sets and/or datum inside a data set
  - How are changes and revisions made to the resource?
  - Citations and attribution
      - Related projects, publications, and links (update reference.bib)
      - A contact person (if possible) to direct further questions to.
      - Link to the YouTube recording of the presentation
